name: Switch (dsekercioglu)
description:
Game:

The first time you click, you will start moving towards the location; the second time you click, you will shoot at that location.

There are two kinds of enemies: Bouncing enemies, and homing mines.

Homing Mines will only start tracking you once you are close enough!

Bugs:

 Game window doesn't scale with screen size on the browser version

 Text might not appear on the entrance, pressing space should still enable access to the game. This issue is being investigated.
